name: Invasion Zero
description:
Invasion Zero is a multi-player online free to play first-shooter game supporting up-to 8 players on a single session where you are able to play against enemy AI bots or players from all over the world.
As the main player, you are equipped with a machine gun, shotgun, or sniper rifle depending on your class with a gun and a knife and a hand grenade.
Your main objective is to survive the battle as much as possible while destroying the spawning enemy forces.

The game contains several playable modes such as:
1- Team Deathmatch (TDM)
2- Free-for-all (FFA)
3- Capture The Flag (CTF)
4- Gun Race (GR)
5- Domination / Cover Point (CP)
6- Search and Destroy (SND)

The graphics of this game are optimized for PC and can be configured in the main menu settings or gameplay settings menu.
The game contains violence and blood.

The game contains violence through ranged and melee weaponry piercing through the body of the enemy players.
